Package se.swedenconnect.sigval.jose.verify

Class JOSESignedDocumentValidator

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.sigval.jose.verify.JOSESignedDocumentValidator
public class JOSESignedDocumentValidator extends Object
XML Document signature validator for validating signatures on XML documents
Author:
Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

    • validate

      public List<se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.SignatureValidationResult> validate(byte[] document, com.nimbusds.jose.Payload detachedPayload) throws SignatureException
      Validate the signed document
      Parameters:
      document - JWS data bytes
      detachedPayload - optional detached payload
      Returns:
      A list of signature validation results representing one signature each
      Throws:
      SignatureException - error validating the signed document

      public static SignedDocumentValidationResult<ExtendedJOSESigvalResult> getConcludingSigVerifyResult(List<se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.SignatureValidationResult> sigVerifyResultList)
      Compile a complete XML signature verification result object from the list of individual signature results
      Parameters:
      sigVerifyResultList - list of individual signature validation results. Each result must be of type ExtendedJOSESigvalResult
      Returns:
      Signature validation result objects
